meanings.definition: A segment or section of something.
meanings.sent1: The orange was divided into several segs for easy sharing.
meanings.sent2: The book was split into different segs for each chapter.
meanings.sent3: The segs of the puzzle made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like segs of a movie, each part distinct and separate.
meanings.sent5: The segs of the map helped us navigate through the forest.

meanings.definition: To divide or separate into segments.
meanings.sent1: She segs the cake into equal portions for everyone.
meanings.sent2: The teacher segs the class into groups for the project.
meanings.sent3: He segs his time between work and hobbies efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The river segs the land, creating beautiful islands.
meanings.sent5: The artist segs the canvas into different colors for a vibrant painting.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with segs spreading underground.
meanings.sent2: The farmer removed the segs to prevent them from taking over the field.
meanings.sent3: The segs in the soil helped the plants absorb nutrients.
meanings.sent4: The segs intertwined beneath the surface, connecting the trees.
meanings.sent5: The segs slowly expanded, reaching new areas of the garden.
